walking today on the sunny side of the street
walking today upon a solid path

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: drunk the bitter dregs of defeat

cognitieve_implicaties: Failure is something that must be 'swallowed' or accepted involuntarily.
theologische_implicaties: Human experience includes a 'cup' of destiny or providence.
ethische_implicaties: Endurance is required even when the experience is repulsive.
onbedoelde_consequenties: Suggests a passive role in one's own defeat.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: A common biblical and literary trope for suffering, though used here with rhetorical force.

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: The Savior's tears... in his tears lies our hope.

cognitieve_implicaties: God is not a distant 'unmoved mover' but is affected by human history.
theologische_implicaties: The suffering of Christ is the primary locus of salvation.
ethische_implicaties: Vulnerability is a 'noble' and 'divine' trait to be emulated.
onbedoelde_consequenties: Potential for Patripassianism (the idea that the Father suffers exactly as the Son).

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher revitalizes the image of the weeping Christ by contrasting it with the 'power' of storms and 'intelligence' of nature.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher maintains a consistent tension between the 'Journey' (human effort/time) and 'Weather' (divine/external circumstances). The transition from the 'Dramatization' of the donkey to the 'Drama' of the tears provides a narrative arc that links historical event to emotional reality.

incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: The preacher acknowledges the linguistic gap between the Transcendent and the Familial.
incoherentie_punten.entailment_conflict: The 'Incomprehensible' cannot be mapped to 'Father' without loss of transcendence.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: Contrastive blending: The preacher uses the 'Power' and 'Intelligence' schemas as a foil to highlight the 'Compassion' schema, making the latter more impactful.

sterktes.beschrijving: Re-activates the source domain of the donkey/jackass to emphasize the 'drama' and 'risk' rather than just the tradition.
sterktes.voorbeeld: seeing the prophet from Nazareth on a jackass enter the city... ludicrous and ridiculous.

sterktes.beschrijving: Uses embodied metaphors of physical sensation (bitter dregs, sunny side, dark clouds) to ground abstract theology.
sterktes.voorbeeld: nerves are on edge... sit at the bedside... watch them sink.

risicos.beschrijving: By focusing heavily on 'God cares' and 'tears,' the judicial or transformative aspects of the Gospel might be softened into mere empathy.
risicos.voorbeeld: In his tears lies our hope.
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation may view God as a co-sufferer but not necessarily a transformer of the situation.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: The road to Jerusalem on Palm Sunday, viewed from the Mount of Olives.
sub_worlds: The sickbed of a loved one
The Arc of Titus in Rome

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: High; creates a sense of 'prophetic simultaneity'.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Repeated warnings that 'it will not always be so' and the 'but now' of the text.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Contrasting the 'roar of the storm' with the 'silent, inward weeping' of Jesus.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Perfectly aligns with the Palm Sunday transition from triumph to the shadow of the Cross.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the JOURNEY and WEATHER domains, used to create a sense of urgency and fragility. It successfully moves from the JURIDICAL/POLITICAL (Rome, capital punishment) to the RELATIONAL (the weeping Savior). The landscape is one of 'perilous' movement where the only stability is the empathy of God.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Deepen the 'Body' or 'Hospital' metaphor to contrast with the 'Government' metaphor used earlier.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The church not as a building of 'proper ceremony' but as a 'field hospital' for the 'weary souls'.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: The 'Drama' of the donkey vs. the 'Reality' of the tears.
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Explicitly link the 'Drama' as the outward sign of the inward 'Tears'—the performance of divine grief.

entailment_checks.metafoor: LIFE IS A JOURNEY (sunny side of the street)
entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: Suggests that 'walking' is the only mode of life; ignores those who are 'stationary' or 'sinking'.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Incorporate the 'Container' metaphor (being held) for those who can no longer 'walk'.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To contrast the 'tobacco-brown walls' of Jerusalem with the 'temple of the spirit'.
alternatieve_domeinen.doel_concept: The permanence of God's presence versus the fragility of human cities.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using CMT to bridge the gap between ancient text and modern existential anxiety. The use of 'tears' as a conceptual bridge for 'hope' is particularly effective.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: An aesthetic analysis would praise the 'bitter dregs' for its poetic quality; CMT reveals it as a mapping of the 'Involuntary Ingestion' schema to explain the necessity of enduring suffering.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Kolb would focus on the 'Experience' of the crowd; CMT focuses on how the 'Crowd' functions as a source domain for 'Unpredictable Human Loyalty'.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: CMT identifies that the preacher's power comes from the 'Verticality' shift: moving from God 'on high' (Power/Intelligence) to God 'beside us' (Brother/Tears).

volledige_metafoor_lijst: dark, muddy corner of the cosmos
appendices.notities: The preacher uses a 'Prophetic' register, frequently shifting between the 'Text World' of 33 AD and the 'Current World' of the 1970s (implied by the Martin Luther King Jr. and capital punishment references).
